review: We love our Amazon Fire TV! I am not particularly tech-savvy, so the ease of set-up and use exceeded my expectations. I had to use the factory reset once when I changed my Amazon password, but everything else has been great! It's very clear which programs & movies are included in my Prime membership. I like how small and unobtrusive the device is, and my young son and I love the voice command! Thank you for making a simple but effective device that lets me make full use of my Prime!
author: Kelly W. Mendez

review: Yes it's fast when you want to watch a movie. I was hoping for a feature where you can use airplay to stream apps from your iphone to the tv. Hope Amazon can make this happen soon !

review: This is a cool device. It interprets voice commands as well or better than anything out there. Combined with Prime and Netflix, it gives you just about as much "free" viewing as you could want. And best of all (assuming the marketing pitch is reasonably close to honest - big assumption, I know), it will learn and get better. I'm certainly satisfied. I'm not blown away, mind you. But I'm not about to knock off stars for missing expectations.
